page.title: 01Introduction To Hoo.
page.content: The character of the study area is partly rural, and partly urban. The major land use category is agriculture but the skyline is dominated in places by Kingsnorth Power Station, and electricity pylons. Although Hoo is certainly a village it has grown rapidly in recent years as a result of its proximity to nearby urban areas. The last 900 years have seen many changes in the area and most people would agree that the rate of change is accelerating, with new houses, shops, schools,recreational centres, and new patterns of work and{life styles. Inevitably people disagree as to whether or not the changes have been for the better or worse.
